list_definition.definition: training or use (especially of the body) through action or effort

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Swimming is one of the healthiest forms of exercise

list_definition.definition: a series of tasks, movements etc for training troops etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His battalion is on an exercise in the mountains.

list_definition.definition: to train or give exercise to
to use; to make use of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was given the opportunity to exercise her skill as a pianist.
